org.as2lib.ant
Class Swf.Xml

java.lang.Object
  org.as2lib.ant.Swf.Xml
Enclosing class:
Swf
public static class Swf.Xml
extends java.lang.Object

Xml represents the swfmill xml data. Just specify the xml-element and put the xml data into a CDATA block as element value.

See Also:
Swf.addConfiguredXml(Xml)
